com.acme.core

Class TeacherReadWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acme.core.TeacherReadWriter

  • public class TeacherReadWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that reads and writes data in a way that is only readable to the program. This class acts as a buffer between the file system and the actual FileManagerGUI.
    Author:
    Edward Liang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a TeacherReadWriter object from the file.

      A convenience method for setTeachers(Teacher[])
      void setTeachers(Teacher[] teachers)

    • Method Detail

      • appendTeacher

        public void appendTeacher(Teacher teacher)
        Adds the given teacher's information into the data file.
        Parameters:
        teacher - - the Teacher object to append to this object's data file

      • setTeachers

        public void setTeachers(Teacher[] teachers)
        Clears the currently held file and writes the objects specified in teacher to the data file.
        Parameters:
        teachers - - the new Teacher objects to be written to this object's data file

      • setTeachers

        public void setTeachers(java.util.ArrayList<Teacher> teachers)
        A convenience method for setTeachers(Teacher[])
        Parameters:
        teachers - - an ArrayList of Teacher's

      • getTeachers

        public Teacher[] getTeachers()
        Gets the teachers that are held in this object's data file.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing the teachers, or null if the file is empty.
